OpportunityElgi.Opportunity: BAS Agent Registration Skill Set
OpportunityElgi.Eligibilitycriteria:
The general eligibility criteria are:
 1- Be an Australian citizen, Australian permenant resident. (includes humanitarian entrant), temporary resident with the necessary visa and work permits on the pathway to permenant residency, or a New Zealand citizen.
 2- QLD resident.
 3- Be aged 15 years or older and no longer at school.
4- Not currently enrolled in training.
